title: 97/734/EC: Commission Decision of 15 October 1997 amending Decision 97/107/EC authorizing methods for grading pig carcases in Belgium (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 15 October 1997 amending Decision 97/107/EC authorizing methods for grading pig carcases in Belgium (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic) (97/734/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 4 of Decision 97/107/EC, the date '31 October 1997` is hereby replaced by '31 October 1998`.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 October 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 301, 20. 11. 1984, p. 1.
